Package cis.project1

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.project1.Deck
  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a standard playing card deck.
    Version:
    Summer 2019
    Author:
    Andrew Weston, Christian Thompson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deck()
      This constructor creates a Deck object representing a deck of standard playing cards.

      This method returns whether the LinkedList representing the deck is empty.

      This method shuffles the deck's cards into a random order.

      This method removes the specified Card object from "this" Deck object.
